Title: Self-inscribed Regular Hyperbolic Honeycombs
Abstract: © 2018, Springer International Publishing AG, part of Springer Nature.This paper describes ways that certain regular honeycombs of non-finite type in d-dimensional hyperbolic space Hd for d= 2, 3 and 5 can be inscribed in others, in particular showing that some can be inscribed properly in copies of themselves.
